subquestion.question: Do you like being licked in the face?
Where's the best place to walk a dog?

moreInfo.title: What constitutes a walk?
moreInfo.text: Walking a dog is a shorthand to mean taking it outside to relive itself, play, run or indeed walk. Walks can be any length of time, and are expected to take place outdoors. A backyard or balcony is not considered a walk.

result.text: Good human! Sounds like you'll make for an excellent dog friend. Click here to see some photos of dogs as a treat *pat pat*
Good human! Sounds like you'll make for an excellent dog friend. Click here to see some photos of dogs as a treat *pat pat*
Bad human! Dogs like being outside, and dogs can't wear most of the things available at a mall anyway.
It sounds like you might not like dogs very much. Dogs love you, why don't you love them back? Here is a link to see some images of dogs not licking you.
